extension.summary: Automatically download artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Dump automatically downloads artwork for media in your video and music libraries into your media file system. It only downloads artwork already added to your libraries.

item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.playrandomvideos) + [Window.IsVisible(videos) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, season)] + ListItem.IsFolder + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + ![String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, plugin) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, addons) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, sources)] + !String.IsEqual(ListItem.FolderPath, add)

Skin.HasSetting(enablecontext:script.playrandomvideos.single) + [Window.IsVisible(videos) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, season)] + ListItem.IsFolder + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + ![String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, plugin) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, addons) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, sources)] + !String.IsEqual(ListItem.FolderPath, add)

extension.summary: Plays random videos from all sorts of lists.
extension.description: This add-on can quickly play random episodes from TV shows, movies from genres/sets/years/tags, and videos from playlists, the filesystem, and just about anything else, other than plugins.
extension.news: v2.0.0 (??) - Kodi 19 Matrix / Python 3 compatibility. Breaks compatibility with previous versions of Kodi.

item.label: Mark as watched again
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:service.tweak.lastplayed) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)] + Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount, 0)

item.label: Remove one watch count
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:service.tweak.lastplayed) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)] + Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount, 1)

extension.summary: Several tools to manage watched status and last played time.
extension.description: Includes context items "Mark as watched again" and "Remove one watch count" under "Manage...", and a service that changes the last played time for videos to update only if at least a small portion has actually been played, hopefully improving the usefulness of lists and add-ons using this timestamp.
extension.news: v1.0.0~rc1 (2020-02-09) - Kodi 19 Matrix / Python 3 compatibility. Breaks compatibility with previous versions of Kodi.
